OUTLINE : Patients stratify histologic type ( anaplastic astrocytoma glioblastoma multiforme v brain stem glioma v medulloblastoma primitive neuroectodermal tumor vs ependymoma vs low grade glioma v others ) . Patients receive phenylacetate continuous intravenous infusion day 1-28 . Courses treatment give continuously without rest . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow weekly . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 9-30 patient per stratum accrue study 2 year .
